MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML7 postcode area of Shott affecting properties in Salsburgh and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to safely complete repairs on an underground cable fault outside 123 Main Street we needed  to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.27pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.36pm on Wednesday 17th March 2021
